懸け詞: (かけことば) - pun; play on words
懸け隔たる: (かけへだたる) - to be far apart; to be remote; to be quite different
懸け隔てる: (かけへだてる) - to put distance between; to estrange
懸け離れる: (かけはなれる) - to be very far apart from; to be remote; to be quite different from
懸り: (かかり) - starting/engaging; (esp. 掛かり, 掛り) expenses/costs; (esp. 掛かり, 掛り; often as カカリ)  attack (esp. a corner approach in the game of go); barb; (掛かり, 掛り only) (esp. for government offices, railways, etc.)  charge/duty/person in charge/official/clerk
懸る: (かかる) - to take (a resource, e.g. time or money); to hang; to come into view/to arrive; to come under (a contract, a tax); to start (engines, motors); to attend/to deal with/to handle; to have started to/to be on the verge of; to overlap (e.g. information in a manual)/to cover; to (come) at; to be fastened; to be covered (e.g. with dust, a table-cloth, etc.); to be caught in; to get a call; to depend on
懸仏: (かけぼとけ) - round plaque carrying the image of a Buddha (usually hammered from behind) used in temples and shrines
懸命: (kenmei) - ansioso, sincero, intenso, fervoroso, assíduo, com o máximo esforço
懸念材料: (けねんざいりょう) - (yoji) cause (grounds) for concern (anxiety); reason for uneasiness
懸案: (けんあん) - pending question; unresolved problem
懸橋: (かけはし) - suspension bridge/viaduct/temporary bridge; mediation/go-between
懸濁: (けんだく) - suspended; suspension (as characteristic of a liquid)
懸獨: (けんだく) - suspended; suspension (as characteristic of a liquid)
懸腕: (けんわん) - way of holding a calligraphy brush, with elbow away from the body and arm in the air
懸腕直筆: (けんわんちょくひつ) - calligraphy technique of holding the brush perpendicularly, lower arm raised, and elbow held away from the body
懸詞: (かけことば) - pun; play on words
懸賞: (けんしょう) - offering prizes; winning; reward
懸賞問題: (けんしょうもんだい) - problem for a prize contest
懸賞論文: (けんしょうろんぶん) - essay contest
懸賞金: (けんしょうきん) - prize money; reward
懸軍万里: (けんぐんばんり) - (yoji) military expedition deep into enemy territory
懸軍長駆: (けんぐんちょうく) - military expedition deep into enemy territory
懸鉤子: (キイチゴ) - raspberry (any plant of genus Rubus, esp. Rubus palmatus var. coptophyllus)
懸隔たる: (かけへだたる) - to be far apart; to be remote; to be quite different
懸隔てる: (かけへだてる) - to put distance between; to estrange
懸離れる: (かけはなれる) - to be very far apart from; to be remote; to be quite different from
懺悔: (ざんげ) - (さんげ is usu. used in Buddhism and ざんげ in other religions) repentance; confession; penitence
懺法: (せんぼう) - penitence by chanting sutras/confession (of sins)/Tendai ritual of chanting Lotus Sutra or to Kanzeon, Amida, or Kichijoten for forgiveness of sins performed unknowingly; penitence sutra; guidebook to penitence
懼る: (おそる) - (v2r-k,v4r,v2r-s,vi)   to fear; to be afraid
懼れる: (おそれる) - to fear; to be afraid of
懾伏: (しょうふく) - prostrating oneself in fear; kneeling in fear; crouching in fear; prostration
懾服: (しょうふく) - prostrating oneself in fear; kneeling in fear; crouching in fear; prostration
戈を収める: (ほこをおさめる) - to sheathe one's sword; to lay down arms; to bury the hatchet
戈旁: (ほこづくり) - kanji "spear" radical at right
戈構え: (ほこがまえ) - kanji "spear" radical at right
戊夜: (ぼや) - fifth division of the night (approx. 3 am to 5 am)
戊子: (ぼし) - twenty-fifth of the sexagenary cycle
戊戌: (ぼじゅつ) - 35th of the sexagenary cycle
戊申詔書: (ぼしんしょうしょ) - Imperial Rescript of 1908
戊種: (ぼしゅ) - person whose physical suitability for conscription in the former Japanese military could not be determined in that year (e.g. due to illness)
戊辰: (ぼしん) - fifth of the sexagenary cycle
戊辰戦争: (ぼしんせんそう) - Boshin War (Japanese civil war between Imperial and shogunate forces, 1868-1869)
戌: (じゅつ) - Sign Of The Dog , eleventh sign of the Chinese zodiac (O Cão, 19h-21h, oeste-noroeste, setembro)
戌年: (いぬどし) - year of the dog
戍る: (まもる) - to protect/to guard/to defend; to keep (i.e. a promise)/to abide (by the rules)/to observe/to obey/to follow
戎講: (えびすこう) - fete in honor of Ebisu (honour)
成さしめる: (なさしめる) - to force to do; to compel
成し遂げる: (なしとげる) - to accomplish; to finish; to fulfill
成す: (なす) - (esp. 成す) to build up/to establish; (esp. 成す) to form/to become (a state); to accomplish/to achieve/to succeed in; to change into; (esp. 為す) to do/to perform; to intend to/to attempt/to try
成す角: (なすかく) - (often ...のなす角) formed angle; angle made
成っていない: (なっていない) - unacceptable; no good; complete failure; inadequate
成ってない: (なってない) - unacceptable; no good; complete failure; inadequate
成らしめる: (ならしめる) - to make become; to let become
成らぬ堪忍するが堪忍: (ならぬかんにんするがかんにん) - True patience lies in bearing the unbearable
成りきる: (なりきる) - to turn completely into; to become completely
成りすまし: (なりすまし) - identity fraud/forgery (e.g. of email)/spoofing; masquerade (esp. for evil purposes)
成りすます: (なりすます) - to pose as; to impersonate
成り丈: (なりたけ) - as much as one can; as much as possible
成り上がり: (なりあがり) - upstart; parvenu; jumped-up person
成り上がる: (なりあがる) - to rise (suddenly) in the world (to a higher position)
成り上る: (なりあがる) - to rise (suddenly) in the world (to a higher position)
成り下がる: (なりさがる) - to be degraded; to come down in the world; to lose status; to be ruined; to fall low
成り下る: (なりさがる) - to be degraded; to come down in the world; to lose status; to be ruined; to fall low
